preference.name: AM_PROJECT_MODE
preference.preference_description: Determines whether the system evaluates the roles in all the active projects of the logged in user, or just the role of the current project, when processing the Role in Project and Role in Projects of Object accessors. The Teamcenter servers must be restarted after setting this site preference, for the setting to become effective in Access Manager evaluation.

preference.name: Tracelink_Edit_enabled
preference.preference_description: Enables users to perform any operations related to Tracelinks. The default value is false. This is a user preference.

preference.name: NV4_Abs_EquipmntRevision_DefaultChildProperties
preference.preference_description: Specifies the list of properties that can be displayed as children of a Design Revision node.

preference.name: NV4_Abs_EquipmntRevision_PseudoFolder
preference.preference_description: Specifies the list of properties that can be displayed as a pseudo-folder under a node for Design Revision object.
